See the License for the specific language governing permissions and limitations under the License. --> Analyzers for indexing content in different languages and domains. For an introduction to Lucene's analysis API, see the Lucene.Net.Analysis namespace documentation. This module contains concrete components ( Lucene.Net.Analysis.CharFilter s, Lucene.Net.Analysis.Tokenizer s, and Lucene.Net.Analysis.TokenFilter s) for analyzing different types of content. It also provides a number of Lucene.Net.Analysis.Analyzer s for different languages that you can use to get started quickly.
